summary: The customer asked about payment options for Contoso Wireless' product TV. The agent informed them that Contoso Wireless accepts all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay and offers financing options through partner companies. They also offer a 10% discount for customers who pay in full upfront, as well as promotional discounts and offers. The customer can also set up recurring payments and purchase an extended warranty if desired. Lastly, they can use multiple payment methods for one purchase by using the split payment option.
